�Electronet�


   Electronet tried to dodge the Big Cannon Blast.  But he was to slow.  The 
Cannon hit his left leg, having the leg blow up.

   "Darn it, I didn't want to Repair it!"  Electronet screamed.

   Electronet fired four optics and four Electric Blast at the Cannon.


>From: "Roland the Gunslinger" <thecode@...>

>Train Wreck was hit by all of the shots again and decided that enough was 
>enough. He let a huge, monstrous cannon unfold from his back. So big and 
>deadly it would be illegal to fire more than 1 shot in a post (work with me 
>here). Unless this thing was dodged, it was going to do some damage, at 
>least the damage of 5 or 6 missiles. He launches it at Electronet...
